title: Speciality Construction
description: Speciality construction is a niche sector within the construction industry that focuses on projects requiring specialized skills, materials, and techniques.

title: Residential Construction
description: Residential construction involves building and renovating homes and housing developments tailored to meet the needs of individuals and families.

title: Commercial Construction
description: Commercial construction includes office buildings, retail centers, warehouses, and other non-residential projects.

title: Industrial Construction
description: Industrial construction covers factories, plants, and other facilities that require specialized infrastructure.
